articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: NASA's Artemis I mega moon rocket test postponed - CNN
articles.description: The final, crucial prelaunch test of NASA's Artemis I mission to the moon was halted Sunday due to issues that prevented the safe loading of propellants into the mega rocket.
